sn49.35-44:1.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya cattaro sammappadhana bhavetabba.
sn49.35-44:1.8: uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn49.35-44:1.9: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ime cattaro sammappadhana bhavetabba”ti.
